imports:
import Card from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Card";
import CardSection from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/CardSection";
example:
() => (
  <Card title="Passenger info" description="All passengers in this itinerary">
    <CardSection>Yasmin Karenth</CardSection>
  </Card>
)

info.title: Default card
info.description: Cards can have titles and descriptions that cover all of their contents plus sections for organization.
